title: Champion Mastery 6 - 7
body: So since Champion mastery 6 - 7 are related to hextech crafting. Are they out now? I don't see any posts about it at all on any PBE sites or anything since the release of crafting so I'm curious. I have champs I wanna get to 7 ):

replies.body:
Hey man, 
_Here's the full picture:_

Originally, **Riot** was going to go with the idea that you could unlock Champion Mastery levels with Blue Essence from Hextech Crafting. You can read more about that [here](http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/XT7eu7jz-champion-mastery-level-6-7).

But this was met with a lot of resistance from the community, and recently **Riot Wingfield** [confirmed](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/4akmnd/champion_mastery_lvl_6_and_7/d11awv6) that they would not be using this system.

As of right now, **Riot** is working on a new system for Champion Mastery levels 6 and 7. [According](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/4ai265/any_update_on_rank_6_7_champion_mastery/d10qb79) to **Riot Socrates**, they didn't release Champion Mastery levels 6 and 7 with Hextech Crafting because they didn't want to delay it.
